评论概述: Nice material quality - but definitely shrinks
评论详情: I had bought this for layering, and while my husband liked me in it, I wouldn’t purchase If you have long arms. I tried it on before washing and it fit perfectly, after I washed it the sleeves shrunk several inches. It looked like I bought a 3/4 sleeve top instead of a long-sleeve top. If you don’t mind shorter sleeves, I’d purchase - but if you like to have long sleeves and you have long arms, I’d look elsewhere. That said, the quality of the top is nice, I wouldn’t worry about it tearing or anything. The style is cute and none of my family realized it wasn’t supposed to be a 3/4 sleeve top. It’s just my personal preference.
Such a cute top and exactly as advertised. Good material and great fit! Love it! It’s definitely more see through but I bought it as a coverup so it’s perfect.
super cute fits really well good material i recommend i wore it as a swimsuit cover but it could be worn just as a sweater too
I ordered this in hopes it would be a good top for me but the sizing is all wrong, I’m about 5’1 and 115 pounds, and it was massive and itchy. Had to return, don’t recommend sorry.

评论详情: I like how it looks and that you can pull the string up or lower it. Nice colors to choose from and the sizing is correct. Washes well. Comfortable and pretty.

Seriously this is probably the nicest lace top I’ve bought online. I needed a quick top to go out and did not expect it to be this pretty. Looks and fits great! I put it on with a short tank top underneath. True to size also!

评论概述: Sent me a USED, OLD, garment!!!!
评论详情: My top came in record time, which was great. But how disappointing to open the bag to find a worn, faded, inside-out, smelly top with no tags. The wash instruction tag was faded like it had been washed several times. I guess someone got their use and returned it and I paid $38 for someone else’s top. So gross. What a disgusting experience.

I love the lightweight but well-made feel of this crocheted shirt.  It is adaptable with the drawstring to use as a top on its own or a cover-up at the beach.  Highly recommend - can't wait to take it to Sint Maarten this weekend!

I had initiated a return but when I was packing it I caught a glimpse of the garment tag inside the shirt that says “brick red”. This looks nothing like the picture. It is a very pumpkin orange color.  Due to time constraints and the lack of desire to order another one in hopes that I get the  “right” color just to end up with the same one again I decided to keep it and just send a warning. Sizing and fit is good. I’m 5’ 9” and I ordered an XL. Just nothing close to the pictured color of brick red. Guess I’ll keep it for October. I added a picture of my “brick rid” bra I had purchased this top to lay over. You can see the difference and how orange the top is in comparison to the pic seller is using to market and my bra as well.
I purchased a large, could have gone with a medium but it still fits. It’s super soft and looks just like the picture. I purchased the brown khaki color one. Will definitely be buying more colors.

I bought this for my going home outfit when leaving the hospital with our baby and it was great for that. Very lightweight and comfortable, I also really like the light pink color. Maybe it’s my postpartum body but it’s not THE most flattering top, but that could possibly change with the right pair of shorts vs comfy pants lol. I do love to wear this top around the house or when taking the baby and the dog on walks in the neighborhood. I also think I could have sized down, but I wanted to play it safe!
Way better quality than I was expecting, I’m impressed
